name: Slimeward Bound
description:
Help Slime Jr. who has been separated from his lifelong friend John, to find his way back to his home by navigating throughout the house!

Given enough moisture and water sources, Slime Jr. is capable of growing in size, expanding his perception of his surroundings and ability to ricochet himself from projectiles he can shoot! Slime Jr. is also capable of duplicating himself to make a perfect copy to fit in small crevices, and he can reabsorb the copies to create one large body!

With these abilities in hand, Slime Jr. is determined to be reunited with John once again!

Credits

The following work was used in the creation of the game with some

modifications made to the pixel art.
